perturbation.original_text:
2.
This Addendum automatically incorporates any future amendments to the Distributor Agreement and such amendments will be made part
of this Addendum to the extent that the amendments do not conflict therewith, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Parties.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.
In the event of a conflict between the Distributor Agreement with this Addendum, the terms of this Addendum shall take precedence.
2.
This Addendum automatically incorporates any future amendments to the Distributor Agreement and such amendments will be made part
of this Addendum, regardless of any conflict, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause 2 states that future amendments to the Distributor Agreement are incorporated into the Addendum only to the extent they don't conflict. Clause 5 says Addendum always takes precedence. By removing the caveat 'to the extent that the amendments do not conflict therewith' from clause 2, and adding 'regardless of any conflict', this now contradicts Clause 5 as it is ambiguous how to resolve potential conflicts between future Distributor Agreement amendments and the current Addendum.
